@Wooooller @CMPG @HighwaysWMIDS @EnvAgency Well that is racism. Why would you assume that?

The amazing #industrial landscape of the Cwmystyth metal mines in #Ceredigion. A long history which includes Bronze Age copper mines and evidence of Roman and Medieval exploitation. Most of surface remains seen today date to the later lead mines worked into the mid-20th C. https://t.co/iKW57C0e2J

Now this is what a proper limestone stream should look like.  The River Lathkill in the Derbyshire Peak District.  Elsewhere we have let our standards drop with litter, farm waste and human sewage.  @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency https://t.co/GOaSqtoqdD

Over 750 properties in Kent are now better protected from flooding, thanks to the Hythe Ranges Sea Defence scheme.

We worked in partnership with @DefenceHQ to deliver this project and saved 1,600 tonnes of carbon.

Watch the full video: https://t.co/yAFA23MBe1

#FCERM https://t.co/oMP8DM6Q8L

tweets.text: The 9th Swift Community Set has gone to the @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyAnglia Iceni House in Ipswich. The team there have been encouraging #Swifts there for many years and have created nest sites in their eaves. An excellent opportunity to boost the declining Swift population here.

The @SussexFlow Initiative uses #naturalfloodmanagement to create a landscape that is more resilient to flooding.

Find out what project has achieved in its end of year review: https://t.co/fiUdQVsuhf https://t.co/KRJzspPsJ5

25 innovative projects to reduce flooding across England selected receive a share of ¬£150 million from Defra as part of the  new Flood and Coastal Resilience Innovation Programme managed by @EnvAgency  https://t.co/l0IlRyjcoK

Some good news for the #Radcliffe & #Redvales scheme today! Phase 1 has reached its target to replace 3 üå≥ for every one that was removed during construction

1,564 have been planted in total! 

Once completed, this ¬£40m scheme will protect more than 800 properties

@BuryCouncil https://t.co/C2DZxUxPka

This shocking picture is a yard filled with illegally dumped construction and demolition waste. #WasteCrime harms our environment and economy. Make sure you dispose of construction waste legally, or risk being fined up to ¬£50,000 or face jail.

Yes, this is an important source of pollution alongside run off from farmland.  These are the 2 main sources of phosphate which are slowly strangling & killing the once majestic #Windermere #LakeDistrict #Cumbria https://t.co/lfJzbWk37h

Are you doing the right thing with building site waste? Waste criminals often take this waste and dump it illegally.

https://t.co/ReD1Pr8Zi5 https://t.co/CxKPluz6cG

urls.title: Police operation to stop thefts of catalytic converters
urls.description: Met officers have executed a number of warrants as part of an operation into the organised criminal theft of catalytic converters.

tweets.text:
This week the Joint Unit for Waste Crime supported the @metpoliceuk on raids across east London, Kent and Essex to stop catalytic converter thefts from vehicles.

The Joint Unit continues to tackle serious and organised #WasteCrime.

Read more: https://t.co/eusBkDuKDe https://t.co/BlrdUhEf45
